query: SELECT name, overview, topThingsToDo, attractions, foodCafes, published FROM island_guides WHERE published = 1 LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT name, overview, topThingsToDo, attractions, foodCafes, published FROM island_guides WHERE published = 1 LIMIT 10

rows.name: Mal√©
rows.overview: Mal√© is the heart of the Maldives, serving as the political, economic, and cultural center. The city is home to the stunning Grand Friday Mosque, colorful local markets, and numerous restaurants and shops. Despite being densely populated, Mal√© offers authentic Maldivian culture and is an excellent starting point for exploring the islands.
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Explore the Grand Friday Mosque (Masjid-al-Sultan Muhammad Thakurufaanu Al Auzam)","description":"Visit the largest mosque in the Maldives, an impressive architectural marvel with a golden dome that is a significant cultural and religious landmark.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Wander through the Local Market (Mal√© Local Market)","description":"Immerse yourself in local life by exploring the bustling market, offering fresh produce, local snacks, and a glimpse into daily Maldivian commerce.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Visit the Mal√© Fish Market","description":"Witness the daily catch brought in by local fishermen and observe the vibrant trade of various fresh seafood, a true insight into the island's primary industry.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Discover the National Museum","description":"Delve into the rich history and cultural heritage of the Maldives through a collection of artifacts, royal antiquities, and historical exhibits.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Stroll along Artificial Beach","description":"Relax at Mal√©'s only man-made beach, popular among locals for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying the city's waterfront atmosphere.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Take a Submarine Tour","description":"Experience the underwater world of the Maldives without getting wet, exploring coral reefs and marine life from the comfort of a tourist submarine.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dine at a Local Maldivian Restaurant","description":"Savor authentic Maldivian cuisine, from fresh seafood curries to traditional 'Garudhiya' (fish broth), at one of the many local eateries.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Walk through Sultan Park and the Islamic Centre","description":"Enjoy a peaceful stroll through the green oasis of Sultan Park, located adjacent to the impressive Islamic Centre, offering a moment of tranquility amidst the city bustle.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Maamigili
rows.overview: Maamigili is a local island in Alifu Dhaalu Atoll, home to Villa International Airport. The island offers authentic Maldivian experiences with local communities, traditional fishing practices, and access to pristine diving sites. It serves as a gateway to the central-south atolls.
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Whale Shark Snorkeling Excursion","description":"Embark on a boat trip to the South Ari Atoll Marine Protected Area (SAMPA), a renowned spot for swimming alongside majestic whale sharks, the gentle giants of the ocean.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Maamigili Local Island Tour","description":"Wander through the local streets of Maamigili, observe daily life, interact with residents, and experience the authentic culture of a Maldivian fishing community.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"PADI Certified Diving at Local Reefs","description":"Explore the vibrant underwater world of Alifu Dhaalu Atoll with certified dives to pristine reefs, encountering diverse marine life including colorful corals, reef sharks, and turtles.","category":"diving","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Sunset Fishing Trip","description":"Join local fishermen on a traditional Dhoni boat as the sun sets, learning Maldivian hand-line fishing techniques and trying your luck at catching dinner.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Kayaking or Stand-Up Paddleboarding","description":"Rent a kayak or stand-up paddleboard and explore the calm, turquoise lagoons surrounding Maamigili at your own pace, enjoying the serenity of the ocean.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Beach Relaxation and Stargazing","description":"Spend a peaceful evening on the island's secluded beaches, enjoying the tranquility and gazing at the brilliant, unpolluted night sky filled with stars.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Visit Villa International Airport (VAM)","description":"Observe the operations of a local airport, watch seaplanes take off and land, and experience the unique atmosphere of a small island aviation hub.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Maaya Thila
rows.overview: Maaya Thila is a world-class dive site featuring dramatic underwater topography with vertical walls and overhangs. Known for encounters with large pelagic species including sharks and rays. Strong currents make it suitable for experienced divers.
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Advanced Night Diving","description":"Experience the thrill of Maaya Thila's nocturnal marine life, including hunting reef sharks and moray eels, under the cover of darkness. This dive requires excellent buoyancy control and comfort with strong currents.","category":"diving","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Daytime Pelagic Dive","description":"Descend into the depths of Maaya Thila to encounter large pelagic species such as grey reef sharks, white-tip reef sharks, and eagle rays. The strong currents make for exhilarating drift dives.","category":"diving","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Underwater Photography Expedition","description":"Capture stunning images of Maaya Thila's diverse marine ecosystem, from schooling fish to dramatic coral formations and large sharks. This activity is best for divers with advanced photography skills and experience in strong currents.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Marine Biology Observation Dive","description":"Focus on identifying and observing the various species inhabiting Maaya Thila, including nudibranchs, frogfish, and different coral types, amidst the larger pelagic action. Requires good diving skills to maintain position.","category":"nature","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Drift Diving Experience","description":"Embrace the powerful currents that define Maaya Thila, allowing them to carry you along the reef walls for an effortless yet thrilling dive. This requires comfort with drift diving techniques and current management.","category":"diving","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Deep Dive Exploration","description":"Explore the deeper sections of Maaya Thila's thila, venturing beyond recreational limits (with appropriate certification) to discover unique marine life and formations. This activity is for highly experienced technical divers.","category":"diving","difficulty":"challenging"}]

rows.name: Bodufolhudhoo
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"House Reef Snorkeling","description":"Discover the vibrant underwater world directly off Bodufolhudhoo's shores. Encounter colorful fish, reef sharks, and healthy corals just steps from the beach.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Manta Ray Excursion","description":"Embark on a boat trip to nearby cleaning stations or feeding grounds to swim alongside majestic manta rays. This incredible encounter is a highlight for many visitors.","category":"nature","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Local Island Walking Tour","description":"Stroll through the charming village of Bodufolhudhoo, observe local life, and interact with residents. Learn about Maldivian culture and daily routines.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Sunset Fishing Trip","description":"Experience traditional Maldivian hand-line fishing as the sun sets over the Indian Ocean. Catch your own dinner, which can often be cooked fresh for you.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Sandbank Picnic & Swim","description":"Take a short boat ride to a secluded sandbank for a private picnic lunch and pristine swimming. Enjoy the ultimate castaway experience on a tiny patch of white sand.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"PADI Certified Diving","description":"Explore incredible dive sites around Alifu Alif Atoll, known for diverse marine life, vibrant reefs, and potential encounters with pelagic species. Options for all certification levels.","category":"diving","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Kayaking or Stand-Up Paddleboarding","description":"Glide across the calm, turquoise lagoon surrounding Bodufolhudhoo. Enjoy a peaceful paddle and take in the stunning views of the island from the water.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dolphin Watching Cruise","description":"Set out on a boat at dawn or dusk to witness playful pods of dolphins leaping and swimming in their natural habitat. A magical experience for nature lovers.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Feridhoo
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Snorkeling at Feridhoo House Reef","description":"Discover the vibrant underwater world just steps from the shore, teeming with colorful fish and healthy coral formations.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dolphin Watching Sunset Cruise","description":"Embark on a traditional Maldivian Dhoni boat to witness playful pods of dolphins leap and twirl against a breathtaking sunset backdrop.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Local Island Walking Tour","description":"Stroll through the charming streets of Feridhoo, observe daily island life, visit the local mosque, and interact with friendly residents.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Sandbank Picnic Excursion","description":"Enjoy a secluded picnic lunch on a pristine, uninhabited sandbank, surrounded by crystal-clear turquoise waters.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Night Fishing Experience","description":"Join local fishermen on a traditional fishing trip under the stars, learning Maldivian handline techniques and hopefully catching your dinner.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Scuba Diving near Feridhoo Thila","description":"Explore renowned dive sites like Feridhoo Thila, known for its diverse marine life, including sharks, rays, and pelagic species.","category":"diving","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Kayaking or Paddleboarding","description":"Rent a kayak or stand-up paddleboard to gently explore the calm, shallow lagoons surrounding Feridhoo island at your own pace.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Himandhoo
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"House Reef Snorkeling","description":"Discover the vibrant underwater world just steps from the shore, encountering colorful coral formations and diverse marine life.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dolphin Cruise at Sunset","description":"Embark on a traditional Maldivian Dhoni to witness playful pods of dolphins leaping through the waves as the sun dips below the horizon.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Traditional Maldivian Fishing Trip","description":"Experience hand-line fishing like a local, trying your luck at catching reef fish often used for a fresh BBQ dinner.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Island Hopping to Nearby Sandbanks","description":"Explore pristine, secluded sandbanks that emerge from the ocean, perfect for sunbathing, swimming, and photography in untouched natural beauty.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Local Island Walking Tour","description":"Stroll through Himandhoo village, observe local life, visit the mosque, and interact with friendly islanders to understand Maldivian culture.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Scuba Diving Excursion","description":"Dive into the deeper waters surrounding Himandhoo to explore spectacular dive sites, encountering manta rays, reef sharks, and intricate coral gardens.","category":"diving","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Beachfront BBQ Dinner","description":"Indulge in a freshly grilled seafood and local delicacies dinner right on the beach, under a canopy of stars.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Kayaking and Paddleboarding","description":"Gently glide over the crystal-clear lagoon waters, offering a serene way to explore the coastline and enjoy the tranquility of the ocean.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Maalhos
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Maalhos House Reef Snorkeling","description":"Discover the vibrant underwater world just steps from the shore, teeming with colorful fish and healthy corals.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Local Island Walking Tour","description":"Stroll through the village, observe local life, visit the mosque, and interact with friendly islanders to understand Maldivian culture.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Sunset Fishing Trip","description":"Experience traditional Maldivian hand-line fishing as the sun sets, with your catch potentially being prepared for dinner.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Sandbank Excursion & Picnic","description":"Take a short boat ride to a secluded sandbank, perfect for sunbathing, swimming, and enjoying a private picnic lunch.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dolphin Watching Cruise","description":"Embark on a boat trip to spot playful pods of dolphins leaping and swimming in their natural ocean habitat.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Traditional Maldivian Cooking Class","description":"Learn to prepare authentic Maldivian dishes like 'Garudhiya' or 'Mas Huni' with local ingredients and guidance.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Scuba Diving at Nearby Dive Sites","description":"Explore diverse dive sites around Maalhos, encountering reef sharks, manta rays, and an abundance of marine life in crystal-clear waters.","category":"diving","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Kayaking or Stand-Up Paddleboarding","description":"Paddle across the calm turquoise lagoon, enjoying panoramic views of the island and surrounding ocean at your own pace.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Mathiveri
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"Snorkeling at Mathiveri House Reef","description":"Discover the vibrant underwater world just steps from the shore, teeming with colorful fish and healthy corals.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Sandbank Excursion","description":"Enjoy a private escape to a pristine, uninhabited sandbank for sunbathing, swimming, and breathtaking photo opportunities.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Dolphin Cruise","description":"Embark on a sunset boat trip to witness playful pods of dolphins leaping and swimming in their natural habitat.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Local Island Cultural Walk","description":"Explore the local village, interact with residents, and learn about the Maldivian way of life, including traditional crafts and architecture.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Night Fishing Trip","description":"Experience traditional Maldivian hand-line fishing under the stars, with your catch potentially being cooked for dinner.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Scuba Diving at Nearby Dive Sites","description":"Explore incredible dive sites around Mathiveri, encountering reef sharks, manta rays, and diverse marine life in crystal-clear waters.","category":"diving","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Kayaking or Stand-Up Paddleboarding","description":"Paddle across the calm, turquoise lagoon, enjoying the serene beauty of Mathiveri from a unique perspective.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Beachfront BBQ Dinner","description":"Savor a delicious fresh seafood BBQ dinner right on the beach, often accompanied by the sound of the waves and a stunning sunset.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"}]

rows.name: Thoddoo
rows.overview: Thoddoo is an authentic local island in North Ari Atoll, famous for its agricultural heritage and traditional Maldivian culture. This peaceful island is known for its watermelon farms, local markets, and fishing traditions, offering genuine cultural immersion.
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"title":"Watermelon Farms","description":"Explore famous watermelon farms","icon":"üçâ"},{"title":"Local Market","description":"Bustling local market","icon":"üè™"},{"title":"Snorkeling","description":"Excellent snorkeling in Baa Atoll","icon":"ü§ø"},{"title":"Beach Relaxation","description":"Pristine beaches","icon":"üèñÔ∏è"}]

rows.name: Kandooma
rows.overview: Kandooma is a scenic island with beautiful beaches and excellent diving spots.
rows.topThingsToDo: [{"name":"House Reef Snorkeling","description":"Discover the vibrant marine life and coral formations just steps from the shore around Kandooma island's extensive house reef.","category":"snorkeling","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Kandooma Thila Diving","description":"Experience world-class diving at Kandooma Thila, a renowned dive site famous for its strong currents, grey reef sharks, eagle rays, and abundant pelagic fish.","category":"diving","difficulty":"challenging"},{"name":"Sunset Dolphin Cruise","description":"Embark on a traditional Maldivian Dhoni boat to witness playful dolphins leaping through the waves as the sun sets over the Indian Ocean.","category":"nature","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Surfing at Kandooma Right","description":"Catch perfect waves at Kandooma Right, a private surf break accessible directly from the island, suitable for intermediate to advanced surfers.","category":"water-sports","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Island Hopping & Local Village Visit","description":"Explore nearby local islands to experience authentic Maldivian culture, interact with residents, and learn about their traditional way of life.","category":"cultural","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Overwater Spa Treatment","description":"Indulge in a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the overwater spa, offering serene ocean views and ultimate relaxation.","category":"relaxation","difficulty":"easy"},{"name":"Night Fishing Experience","description":"Try your hand at traditional Maldivian night fishing, using hand lines to catch reef fish under the stars, followed by a BBQ of your catch.","category":"adventure","difficulty":"moderate"},{"name":"Beachfront Dining Experience","description":"Enjoy a romantic dinner under the stars with your feet in the sand, featuring fresh seafood and international cuisine, accompanied by the sound of the waves.","category":"food","difficulty":"easy"}]

Thoddoo	Thoddoo is an authentic local island in North Ari Atoll, famous for its agricultural heritage and traditional Maldivian culture. This peaceful island is known for its watermelon farms, local markets, and fishing traditions, offering genuine cultural immersion.
